{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Green Dream Orb |image = [[File:Green Dream Orb.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Green Dream Orb''. |location =
*[[Towns & Cities#Unova|Black and White Park]] }} ==Description== The '''Green Dream Orb''' can be opened at the [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Black and White Park]] as soon as you get Tornadus (Therian) from opening the [[Pink Dream Orbs]]. ==Opening Animation== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! !! Animation |- ! Animation | [[File:Green Dream Orb Opening.gif|60px]] |} ==Acquisition== Green [[Dream Orbs]] can be gotten as soon as you get Tornadus (Therian) from the [[Pink Dream Orbs]]. ==Drop Pool== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" |- ! Reward !! Drop Chance |- | [[File:Drifloon Shuffle.png|40px]] Drifloon || 15% |- | [[File:Bronzor Shuffle.png|40px]] Bronzor || 15% |- | [[File:Sigilyph Shuffle.png|40px]] Sigilyph || 12.5% |- | [[File:Red Shard Updated.png|30px]] [[Red Shard]] || 12.5% |- | [[File:Blue Shard Updated.png|30px]] [[Blue Shard]] || 12.5% |- | [[File:Yellow Shard Updated.png|30px]] [[Yellow Shard]] || 12.5% |- | [[File:Green Shard Updated.png|30px]] [[Green Shard]] || 12.5% |- | [[File:Thundurus (Therian) Shuffle.png|40px]] Thundurus (Therian) || 7.5% |- |}
